Contradict fact: The claim that the Bernie Sanders rally in California was ignored by the news media contradicts the fact that the rally was covered by various news outlets.
Understate: The claim may understate the extent of media coverage of the Bernie Sanders rally in California by suggesting that it was completely ignored.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide evidence or sources to back up the assertion that the rally was ignored by the news media.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the lack of coverage of the rally by mainstream news outlets indicates that it was ignored, without considering other factors that may have influenced the coverage.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the rally may not have received as much coverage as expected due to various factors such as competing news stories or editorial decisions.
